name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: A juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and pickles on a toasted bun.
ingredients: beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, bun

name: Veggie Burger
description: A hearty vegetable-based patty with avocado, lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo on a whole wheat bun.
ingredients: vegetable patty, avocado, lettuce, tomato, vegan mayo, whole wheat bun

name: BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Beef patty with crispy bacon, onion rings, and BBQ sauce, served on a brioche bun.
ingredients: Beef patty, bacon, onion rings, BBQ sauce, brioche bun

name: Chicken Sandwich
description: Grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and honey mustard on a toasted bun.
ingredients: Chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, honey mustard, bun

name: Sweet Potato Fries
description: Crispy sweet potato fries served with a side of spicy mayo dip.

name: Onion Rings
description: Golden and crispy onion rings served with BBQ dipping sauce.

name: Milkshake
description: Thick and creamy milkshake available in chocolate, vanilla, or strawberry.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, Caesar dressing

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Spicy buffalo wings served with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing.
ingredients: Chicken wings, buffalo sauce, celery, blue cheese dressing

name: Fish Tacos
description: Grilled fish tacos with cabbage slaw, avocado, and a lime crema.
ingredients: Fish, cabbage slaw, avocado, lime crema, taco shells

name: Bacon Cheese Fries
description: French fries topped with melted cheese and crispy bacon bits.

name: Mozzarella Sticks
description: Fried mozzarella cheese sticks served with marinara dipping sauce.

name: Coleslaw
description: Creamy coleslaw made with fresh cabbage and carrots.

name: Chocolate Sundae
description: Classic chocolate sundae with whipped cream, nuts, and a cherry on top.
ingredients: Ice cream, chocolate syrup, whipped cream, nuts, cherry

name: Iced Tea
description: Refreshing iced tea, brewed daily and served with lemon.
